meanings.definition: Grasping the meaning or nature of something.
meanings.sent1: The students were very comprehending of the new concept.
meanings.sent2: She is a comprehending individual who always understands others' feelings.
meanings.sent3: The comprehending cat seemed to know exactly what its owner needed.
meanings.sent4: His comprehending gaze seemed to see right through her excuses.
meanings.sent5: The comprehending smile on her face showed she understood the situation perfectly.

meanings.sent1: The comprehending package contained all the necessary items.
meanings.sent2: The comprehending list covered every aspect of the project.
meanings.sent3: The comprehending picnic basket held a variety of delicious treats.
meanings.sent4: The comprehending sky seemed to stretch on forever.
meanings.sent5: The comprehending map showed all the landmarks in great detail.
